subject: Harness Racing
Hambletonian (Harness Race)
lead_paragraph: Lucky Chucky was made the 5-2 favorite in a field of 10 3-year-olds in the $1.5 million Hambletonian at the Meadowlands on Saturday.
snippet: Lucky Chucky was made the 5-2 favorite in a field of 10 3-year-olds in the $1.5 million Hambletonian at the Meadowlands on Saturday.
